channel.title: Ip problem
channel.description:
idk if im posting this in the right place but.. my ip keeps changing everytime i restart my computer and its a problem for my server because other players keep on having to change thier connecting ip on the client everytime they want to log in because mine keeps changing. if theres anyway to use just one ip without it changing can someone let me know or do it for me through teamviewer? pm me or reply. thx :)
-lexi ~owner of scenemoscape
